meanings: cheap(ly), inexpensively, at a low[moderate] price, [영구어] on the cheap.

vlive.korean: 아~ 이거 싸게 해드린 겁니다 이거! This is such a great deal! 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : ★선공개★ EP.8 시간여행 떠난 다모임! 응답하라 1984ㅣ둘도 없는 힙합 친구 : 다모임ㅣDingo Freestyle
vlive.english: This is such a great deal!

vlive.korean: [큰 우유 780원(?)] 780원 싸게 사면 그 정도 하지 않을까요? [780 won for a big carton?] If we get it for a bargain, then about 780 won? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “JRTYLOG ③” (종현 : 태용)
vlive.english: [780 won for a big carton?] If we get it for a bargain, then about 780 won?

vlive.korean: 싸게 팝니다! - 내가 58,000원인데! You're selling it too cheap! - It's 58,000 won! 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 그렇게 믿었건만...
vlive.english: You're selling it too cheap! - It's 58,000 won!

vlive.korean: [안 알려줘서 꾹이 삐짐] 싸게 3판 시켜 먹는 게 낫지 않나요? Isn't it better to order 3 pizzas that are cheap? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP07_막장 PPL 해볼래?
vlive.english: Isn't it better to order 3 pizzas that are cheap?

vlive.korean: 잘 어울리네, 내가 싸게 해 줄게 - 이거 어깨 맞아요? It fits you well, I'll make it cheap for you. - Do the shoulders fit? 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 그렇게 믿었건만...
vlive.english: It fits you well, I'll make it cheap for you. - Do the shoulders fit?
